init.example.js

¶

hive.init(dir)

 
var hive = require('hive');
¶

dir must be a string and an absolute path to your project's root directory

 
             		           
                               
                            
                 ¶               
               
Calling hive.init(__dirname) will initialize the app in the current directory of the executing process. 
             		                            
hive.init(__dirname);
